Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for COBAS INTEGRA Chloride Electrode Gen. 2 for quantitative determination of sodium, potassium, chloride, and lithium in serum, plasma, and urine using ion-selective electrodes
Indications for Use Summary: Intended for quantitative determination of sodium, potassium, chloride in serum, plasma and urine, and lithium in serum and plasma; recommended for plasma sample analysis and may be used with serum and urine samples for diagnosis and treatment of electrolyte and metabolic disorders
